title: Protecting homes with netting window screens can reduce malaria parasite infection

title_detail.value: Protecting homes with netting window screens can reduce malaria parasite infection

summary: Protecting houses against mosquitoes with netting window screens can suppress malaria vector populations and dramatically reduce human parasite infection prevalence, according to new research.

summary_detail.value: Protecting houses against mosquitoes with netting window screens can suppress malaria vector populations and dramatically reduce human parasite infection prevalence, according to new research.
